name: Cameron–Erdős conjecture
summary:
In combinatorics, the Cameron–Erdős conjecture (now a theorem) is the statement that the number of sum-free sets contained in 
  
    
      
        [
        N
        ]
        =
        {
        1
        ,
        …
        ,
        N
        }
      
    
    {\displaystyle [N]=\{1,\ldots ,N\}}
  
 is 
  
    
      
        O
        
          
            (
          
        
        
          
            2
            
              N
